chara.textHome: Maaan...I'm tired!

I can't focus on class today,
I just gotta MOVE, you know!

All I'm doing in class is listening to the
teacher talk, but my shoulders lock up
and I get all drowsy...

I can barely keep awake!
And I can't study at all, either.
Welp, I'm gonna skip afternoon classes!
Don't tell Chisato, got it?

Chisato freaks out so much at
those zombie shootin' games!

She looks tough, but she's a total fraidy-cat!
It's obvious!
Hee hee!
This is a Magical Girl's power?
Nice! I could get used to this!
Mmmnghhh!
I think I'm finally awake!
And I feel better than ever!

The strength I wished for when I became
a Magical Girl didn't cure my loneliness.

I was finally able to change when
I met Chisato and the others...

I wanna pay everyone back for
being my friends...

I'm not great at thinking,
so it might take some time to come up with
something to do for 'em.

It's gotta be something
I can do with my strength...

How can you be THIS late?!
Seriously, were you walking around
with your head in the clouds?!

Okay, fine. Since you're here...
Help me with my homework, okay?
Mnn... *Yaaawn*
Hm? Morning?

Nah, couldn't be...
I mean, I just went to bed...
Zzz... *Yaaawn*
Agh, I'm hungry!

You know what, I'm done.
I can't focus on class right now.

I'm ditching and going to the
convenience store.
Nooow, what's for lunch?â™ª
Fiiinally, it's over...

All I did was miss class and one little
test, so why do I gotta go to these
make-up lectures, huh?
C'mon, Teach, have a heart!
I've made up my mind...

I'm reading the whole series straight
through!

There's 150 volumes, but one night's
more than enough! No sweat!
Don't underestimate me!
My pudding is gone?!

Wh-who...Who had the NERVE to
steal my pudding?!

Wait, I kinda think I ate
mom and dad's pudding...

Well, how 'bout joining me for a
quick round?
What, ya scared of going on patrol?

Don't worry, I'll squash any enemies
that pop up!
Wow, now this is a strange place.
Well, I don't care much for details!
We'll eliminate all these copies of us!
Lucky! School is out before lunch!
Now, where to!

Inviting Matsuri to go into town
might be fun!

I almost got sent home by the police
'cause I stayed at the arcade
so late last night.
I've gotta be more careful...

Using my finishing move takes a lot
out of me, but...
Get too stingy and victory will slip away!
Counter into a combo!

Charge up while the enemy is off-balance
and land a finishing move! K.O.!
Yep, that's the winning formula!
I used to be such a gloomy, quiet girl...
Well, I suppose I was kinda adorable?

I bet you can hardly imagine me like
that now.

Becoming a Magical Girl made me
stronger, and I sure showed 'em all!
But I thought it'd be different somehow...
Just can't figure it out.
Honestly, I never was a people person.

I sure am glad I took her hand when
she reached out...

I sure am glad I took her hand when
she reached out...

When the four of us get in a groove during
battle, I know I'm not alone anymore.
It's so reassuring...

I want to protect the place I belong.
I want to protect my three important friends.

Had to tear myself outta bed this morning
'cause the patrol ran late last night...

Well, I have to tear myself outta bed
every morning anyway, so whatever!
Guess we'll go another round!
Uuugh... Sooo bored.
I gotta rush home and take a shower.

These punks are too weak
to be starting fights!
Face it, I'm getting way too strong!

I'm Arisa Narumi!
I'm pretty famous at school
...as a delinquent.

Oh, but...I don't actually do anything BAD,
you know? Don't freak out!
Yep, this is goodâ™ª
All right! I'll get even stronger, you'll see!
Huh... Wait, is this for real?!
Wow, I'm the coolest!
Whoa, that...wasn't bad at all!
You can count on me more than you'd think.

I can't study to save my life,
but I'm great at video games!

I just got done givin' some clown
a beatdown in a fighting game!

Looks like that chump I trashed
at the arcade has been practicing.
But hey, doesn't matter how much you train!
I'll pummel you just as hard next time!
